entities.description: The raw count of survey responses prior to any weighting adjustments.
The total number of valid survey responses.
Data that is not available or missing from the survey responses.
Calculated measures such as mean, median, mode, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
The type of variable, which in this case is numeric.

relationships.description: Indicates the raw frequency count of each survey response.
Relates the survey to the overall count of valid responses.
Indicates the presence of missing data in the survey responses.
Relates the survey responses to various statistical measures derived from the data.
Describes the type of data, which is numeric in this context.
